events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue was categorized under 'Refund' based on the customer's request for money back due to receiving an incorrect product.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M. who handles refund and return requests.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear that you received the wrong item. I’ll be happy to assist you with your refund.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 458723, and I have attached the photo showing the incorrect item that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately, and you should see the amount credited within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund update. I appreciate your help resolving this issue.
The refund has been processed and the case is now considered resolved. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and to check if there is anything else we can assist you with.
The case has been formally closed. Thank you for contacting our support team, and have a great day!
